overview: Nadia, a mother and her two children: Valeria and Julián, both teenagers, make up a simple and united family. We see them in their daily lives: sharing meals, doing homework and even dancing, until one night Julián can't take it anymore and opens his mother's eyes begging her to end her insane fantasy. And from that moment on, Nadia will no longer be able to escape her reality. Her daughter is gone, her room is empty, and the dining table no longer has three places, but only two. And this is how we get to the last scene of this story: Nadia decides to do something with her pain and joins the “Las Vigilantas”.
title: Y entonces llegaron ellas
